problem_names: lemma step_deterministic: "s1 \<rightarrow> s2 \<Longrightarrow> s1 \<rightarrow> s3 \<Longrightarrow> s2 = s3"
lemma final_finished: "final s \<Longrightarrow> finished step s"
translations: lemma step_deterministic: "s1 \<rightarrow> s2 \<Longrightarrow> s1 \<rightarrow> s3 \<Longrightarrow> s2 = s3"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>s1 \<rightarrow> s2; s1 \<rightarrow> s3\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> s2 = s3

by (induction rule: step.cases;
      auto elim!: step.cases dest: is_true_and_is_false_implies_False)
lemma final_finished: "final s \<Longrightarrow> finished step s"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. final s \<Longrightarrow> finished (\<rightarrow>) s

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. final s \<Longrightarrow> \<not> Ex ((\<rightarrow>) s)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>final s; Ex ((\<rightarrow>) s)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> False
assume "final s" and "\<exists>x. step s x"

proof (state)
this:
  final s
  \<exists>x. s \<rightarrow> x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>final s; Ex ((\<rightarrow>) s)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (chain)
picking this:
  final s
  \<exists>x. s \<rightarrow> x

proof (prove)
using this:
  final s
  \<exists>x. s \<rightarrow> x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>s'.
        s \<rightarrow> s' \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  s \<rightarrow> s'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>final s; Ex ((\<rightarrow>) s)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
using this:
  s \<rightarrow> s'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (prove)
using this:
  s \<rightarrow> s'
  final s

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. False

proof (state)
this:
  False

goal:
No subgoals!

proof (prove)
using this:
  final ?s \<Longrightarrow> finished (\<rightarrow>) ?s
  \<lbrakk>?s1.0 \<rightarrow> ?s2.0; ?s1.0 \<rightarrow> ?s3.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?s2.0 = ?s3.0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. semantics (\<rightarrow>) final

inductive load :: "('fenv, 'a, 'fun) prog \<Rightarrow> ('fenv, 'a, ('fun, 'b) frame) state \<Rightarrow> bool" where
  "F_get F main = Some fd \<Longrightarrow> arity fd = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
  load (Prog F H main) (State F H [Frame main 0 []])"
